1214740.name: Frequency Sync
1214740.description:
Drive the world and make it dance as you piece together the geometric puzzles and build the musical tracks together. Frequency is a Fast Paced Music based Geometric Puzzle Game where you must piece together different geometric pieces to build together musical tracks. Each piece pulses to different audio frequency spectrum bands from bass through the mid and treble, bringing you into the music. 40 Levels of different geometric and musical puzzles for you to solve, along with musical visualizers and a track selection.

Get ready to experience a puzzle game like no otherâ€”where beats, colors, and strategy collide in perfect harmony! Frequency Sync blends the energy of dance music with brain-teasing puzzles, creating an immersive, rhythm-driven challenge that reacts to every move you make.

ğŸµ Solve Puzzles to the Beat

Each level features a unique geometric puzzle that shifts and evolves in sync with the music. Your goal? Match patterns, shift colors, and time your moves to align with the beat.

ğŸ¶ Mesmerizing Music Visualizers

As you play, dynamic visualizers pulse and transform based on the songâ€™s energy and your progress. Watch neon waves ripple, geometric shapes explode, and dazzling light shows unfoldâ€”all influenced by your puzzle-solving skills.

ğŸ”Š A Soundtrack That Moves You

Featuring an electrifying mix of dance, house, synthwave, and EDM tracks, Frequency Sync offers a sound-driven experience that keeps you engaged from start to finish.

Demo Available Now

A demo is available now on Steam and Meta Quest! Experience the rhythm, solve the puzzles!
